title: 9-1 placement and got B3... what a joke!
body:
Just played S5 placements and did quite well (9W-1L) and got put into B3.

The trolling never stops here.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=NH0WkemR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-28T21:02:09.412+0000)
>
> For one thing, you were bronze last season. For another, your MMR is sitting around 1000.

I understand, i have a low MMR from last season but surely somewhere in those 10 placement games (9 wins)... Riot Game(~~s~~) should have put me with higher MMR players and see how i have fared and use that for an accurate ranking?

No? too logical?
you were playing with and against other bronze lvl players in placements... this is how ranked works man.

I think you have missed my point and thank you for explaining how ranked system works.

I'm talking about placement games... where you play 10 games to measure your skill level (or MMR) and then get put into a rank.
Yeh you were bronze last season so you got matched against bronze for placements so people that arent stupid bronzen %%%%s don't have to play with you and gain free losses.

> [{quoted}](name=skillzorddragonb,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=NH0WkemR,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-28T23:55:38.614+0000)
>
> Yeh you were bronze last season so you got matched against bronze for placements so people that arent stupid bronzen %%%%s don't have to play with you and gain free losses.

Going by this and your other comments. I can understand why this is too much for you to comprehend.
And what rank were you last season? Bronze something... your previous rank plays a HUGE role in where you end up

> GET READY GUISE. I'M GONNA GET DIAMOND.

Shame, you had your hopes SO high.

you could be in bronze 5 with 10 wins and still complain how you aren't in gold. it really depends on how well you do in each game and if it remotely DECENT enough to be silver elo or higher. you aren't achieving anything from this if you're going to neglect everyones comment and only be small-minded to yours and yours only.

Let me dumb the question down for you.

Is there a difference between 10 wins in ranked (irrespective division) games and 10 wins in placement games? - The general feedback from here is "No" there isn't (am i right?).

So my question is... if they are the same then "WHY" does everyone have to play them at the start of each season?

On the flip side: if placement games and ranked games are not the same:
-Placement games are your opportunity for Riot to reassess your MMR for the new season and get placed accordingly.
-Ranked games for you to gain/lose LP after you have been given a grade in the placement games.
Then its broken (no?)

> Let me dumb the question down for you.

I stopped reading after you said that. I'm not here to banter with anyone. Having said that, enjoy your stay in Bronze!

> if they are the same then "WHY" does everyone have to play them at the start of each season?

Because it 'resets' your rank so that it reflects your MMR. Fact is you can have an MMR sitting an entire division below your rank, the placement games at the start of each season fixes that.
you were bronze last season, not a suprise....

what rank were you last season?
not pre season

So what is the point of having placement games? Just put everyone where they left off last season...

Placement games should be an opportunity for people to show case their off-season improvements and get a proper ranking for the new season.

> [{quoted}](name=zhengeist,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=NH0WkemR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-28T20:58:41.627+0000)
>
> So what is the point of having placement games?

To put everyone in a rank that reflects their MMR.
